mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.vm_no AS "vmNo", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.reader_no AS "readerNo", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.platform_state AS "platformState", a.supplier_state AS "supplierState", a.vm_state AS "vmState", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.bar_code AS "barCode", a.standard_stock AS "standardStock", a.group_id AS "vmGroup.id", vmGroup.name AS "vmGroup.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_vending_machine( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, vm_no, name, type, reader_no, province, city, area, address, platform_state, supplier_state, vm_state, create_time, bar_code, standard_stock, group_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{vmNo}, #{name}, #{type}, #{readerNo}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{platformState}, #{supplierState}, #{vmState}, #{createTime}, #{barCode}, #{standardStock}, #{vmGroup.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_vending_machine SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, vm_no = #{vmNo}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, reader_no = #{readerNo}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, platform_state = #{platformState}, supplier_state = #{supplierState}, vm_state = #{vmState}, create_time = #{createTime}, bar_code = #{barCode}, standard_stock = #{standardStock}, group_id = #{vmGroup.id} WHERE id = #{id}
